Html:
Have you evere bumped on a case where the map will not cache correctly(i supposed)

The fact is that the map will show only the 1/3 from left to right and as you move around the markers and route will dissapear and in place of them white space.

If you ever found yourself in my shoes please do offer a hint.
PS:The project I work has a tabstrip and in every tab there is a map with different controlname

I took the functions of 1st page which works perfectly and compared it with the 3rd-tab map.
The code shows no differences.Could it be luck of memory?Cache problem? You may wish to contribute and provide an answer for others to see
